episodes.title: Descenso
episodes.plot: Chilean drug chemist Cockroach brings his product to Colombian smuggler Pablo Escobar. DEA agent Steve Murphy joins the war on drugs in Bogota.

episodes.title: The Sword of Simón Bolivar
episodes.plot: Communist radical group M-19 makes a move against the narcos, while Murphy gets an education in Colombian law enforcement from his new partner Peña.

episodes.title: The Men of Always
episodes.plot: Murphy encounters the depths of government corruption when he and Peña try to derail Escobar's political ambitions by proving he's a narco.

episodes.title: The Palace in Flames
episodes.plot: Despite a new extradition treaty, the U.S. puts more money into fighting communism, creating new challenges for Murphy and Peña in the hunt for Pablo.

episodes.title: There Will Be a Future
episodes.plot: Pablo's extreme methods put the narcos on the brink of war with Carillo and the government. Peña tries to protect his witness.

episodes.title: Explosivos
episodes.plot: Peña and Carillo close in on Gacha. Murphy tries to protect pro-extradition candidate Gaviria from a notorious assassin connected to Pablo.

episodes.title: You Will Cry Tears of Blood
episodes.plot: Pablo goes into hiding as the political tide turns against him, but he finds a way to strike back. Murphy and Peña finally get the CIA to help them.

episodes.title: La Gran Mentira
episodes.plot: A tragic mistake forces the government to change tactics in the fight against Pablo. But Pablo faces bigger threats from inside his empire.

episodes.title: La Catedral
episodes.plot: The hunt for Pablo seems to be over after he makes a deal with the government, but Murphy and Peña - and the Cali Cartel - have other plans.

episodes.title: Despegue
episodes.plot: Pablo's activities in prison provoke the government into taking extreme action. Murphy and Peña face a situation of their own.
